instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00164 No power No light
threads.message:
Hi!
I/O BOARD 15.25 V
PPCDIN_G3H
Fluctuates fast non stop  from 0.503v - 1.9v
 PP3V42_G3H
Fluctuates fast non stop  from 0.159v - 1.2v
L7130
same
L7630
Same
L7430 0V

L7560
fluctuate

L7520 0.168V

q7130 and Q7630 flashes intermittently  under thermal cam.

threads.title: 820-00164 No power No light
threads.message:
PPDCIN_G3H comes from DCIN board.
Check J7000 and continuity between MLB and DCIN boards.

Did you try known good DCIN board?

threads.title: 820-00164 No power No light
threads.message:
This is a new board i got from ebay! I have no more.  Before getting the new board i was having no power!

J7000
Fluctuate. 
If i measure  the connector directly 15,25 V

Im not sure MLB stand for!

threads.title: 820-00164 No power No light
threads.message:
Main Logic Board.

Then check the trace for PPDCIN_G3H...

threads.title: 820-00164 No power No light
threads.message:
I replaced q7130 and q7630, now i got some voltages back. Charger still has no green light. fan spins for a couple of seconds den stop.

PPDCIN_G3H  14.66 V
PP3V42_G3H    3.380 V
PP3V42_G3H 8.58 V
pp3v3_s5  3.3V
PP5V_S4RS3  0.0 V
pp3v3_sus 3.3V
L7430 0.0 V
L7630 0.0 V
L7310 0.0 V
L7320 0.0V
L7130 8.58V

L7560 3.3V
L3095 0.0V
L7520 0.0V

ALL_SYS_PWRGD 0.59 V

threads.title: 820-00164 No power No light
threads.message:
"
PP3V42_G3H    3.380 V
PP3V42_G3H 8.58 V"
???

Test first SMC bypass mode.

Check PM_RSMRST_L, PM_PWRBTN_L, PCH_DSWVRMEN, PM_DSW_PWRGD, SMC_ADAPTER_EN, PM_BATLOW_L and all PCH's RTC (DC) signals.
